nodes.text: Star Wars Resistance Animation-Magazine is a German magazine published by Panini. It contains information and comics based on the animated television series Star Wars Resistance, and it replaced the similarly formatted Star Wars Rebels Animation-Magazine. The first issue was published on May 15, 2019. The series was shut down after the release of the fourth issue.
A similar magazine - Star Wars Fun & Action - began publication in March 2020, continuing the Star Wars Resistance comic strips.
